message_1: What is the output of the SHA-256 algorithm when it is applied to the message "Hello, world!"?
message_2:
To compute the SHA-256 hash of the message "Hello, world!", you can use a programming language or an online tool. Here's the hash:

`315f5bdb76d078c43b8ac0064e4a0164612b1fce77c869345bfc94c75894edd3`

Keep in mind that the hash is case-sensitive, so "Hello, world!" will produce a different hash than "hello, world!" or "HELLO, WORLD!".
